import React from "react"; import { Layout, Menu } from "antd"; import { UserOutlined, ShopOutlined, LogoutOutlined, NotificationOutlined, FormOutlined, ShoppingOutlined, InteractionOutlined, UserAddOutlined, UsergroupDeleteOutlined, } from "@ant-design/icons"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; function Sidebar() { const { Sider } = Layout; const getItem = (label, key, icon, children, type, link) => ({ key, icon, children, label: {label}, type, link, }); const items = [ getItem("İdari Büro", "1", , [ getItem( "İdari Büro Duyuru", "duyuru", , null, null, "/idariburoduyuru" ), getItem( "İdari Büro Nöbetler", "nobet", , null, null, "/idariburonobetler" ), ]), getItem("Personeller", "2", , [ getItem( "Personel Ekle", "ekle", , null, null, "/personelekle" ), getItem( "Personel Göster", "goster", , null, null, "/personelgoster" ), ]), getItem("Ürünler", "3", , [ getItem( "Ürünleri Listele", "listele", , null, null, "/urunlistele" ), getItem( "Ürünleri Güncelle", "guncelle", , null, null, "/urunguncelle" ), ]), getItem("Çıkış Yap", "4", , null, null, "/logout"), ]; return ( <>

PAUL SAWYER
); } export default Sidebar;
